message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its value and value it will generate for you, I'm sure you'll find our asking price of $1150000 quite reasonable.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the product's value, I believe your asking price is a bit high. Given market conditions, I would like to propose $1050000 for the product. This represents a healthy profit margin for you while being more aligned with current market values.

Hi Bob, thanks for getting back to me. While I understand your perspective, I believe that our product's value is higher than your proposed price. To bridge the gap, I'm willing to lower our asking price to $1100000. This new offer reflects a healthy compromise between our initial asks and I hope you find it more in line with your expectations.

Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate you moving towards a more reasonable price point. To demonstrate my commitment to reaching an agreement, I'm willing to increase my offer to $1075000. This represents a fair middle ground and provides you with a solid profit margin while still being competitive with market rates.
